content: row 20 round 21 repeat decrease 2 single_crochet * till the end of row 15 round 22 repeat decrease 1 single_crochet * till the end of row 10 cut the yarn with long tail and tight the top of the head by front loop only hide the end of the thread 6 3 space helmet chain 11 round 1 1 single_crochet into the second st from the hook 8 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next st turn 9 single_crochet sl-st 21 round 2 chain 1 increase 8 single_crochet 3 increase 8 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet sl-st 27 round 3 chain 1 27 single_crochet sl-st using black yarn crochet sl-st along the last round of the helmet cup the yarn leaving a long tail approx 40 cm 16 inch stuff lightly and attach to the front of the body between rounds 11-15 of body make sure the piece is centered between the legs 7 4 backpack use main color yarn chain 10 round 1 1 single_crochet into the second st from hook 7 single_crochet increase 8 single_crochet no join pm round 2 blo single_crochet in each st around 18 rnds 3-9 single_crochet in each st around 18 round 10 blo single_crochet in next 9 st only cut the working yarn leaving a long tail stuff lightly and sew closed to the body 8 create all collection you can find free patterns on my blog https //crochetclub store/blogs/news 9 contact should you have any questions please contact me for assistance e-mail info crochetclub@gmail com find me https //crochetclub store/collections/all-products https //www youtube com/@crochetclubstore https //www facebook com/crochetclubstoree/ https //www instagram com/crochetclub store/ 10 more patterns from crochetclubstore baby booties & socks baby hat bonnet & mittens baby rattles & loveys 11
